trans-unit.source: Defines the behavior of a service that acts as a container of types.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ITypeProvider can be pushed as a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> service to discover data types that are necessary for extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) workflow activation.
Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the named entity.
A string that contains the name of the entity.
The <xref:System.Type> of the named entity.
Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the named entity.
A string that contains the name of the entity.
A value that indicates whether to throw an exception if `name` is not resolvable.
The <xref:System.Type> of the named entity.
Creates and returns an array which contains each <xref:System.Type> known to this instance.
An array which contains each <xref:System.Type> known to this instance.
Temporary assembly that is generated during the compilation process to validate the types in the active project that is being compiled.
The local <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> defined by this instance.
Gets a collection of all assemblies referenced by the <xref:System.Type>.
A collection of all assemblies referenced by the <xref:System.Type>.
Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of load error exceptions keyed by the <xref:System.Object> causing the <xref:System.Exception>.
An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of load error exceptions keyed by the <xref:System.Object> causing the <xref:System.Exception>.
Occurs when the collection <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.TypeLoadErrors*> is modified.
To be added.
Occurs when the types in the type provider that implements this interface change.
This can happen when an assembly or <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> is added or removed from the type provider.
To be added.
